remarks: Alternate expression for the value of the Cantor normal form function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-Jun-2019.)
statement:
cantnfs.s $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfs.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnfcl.g $e |- G = OrdIso ( _E , ( F supp (/) ) ) $.
cantnfcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. S ) $.
cantnfval.h $e |- H = seqom ( ( k e. _V , z e. _V |-> ( ( ( A ^o ( G ` k ) ) .o ( F ` ( G ` k ) ) ) +o z ) ) , (/) ) $.
cantnfval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A CNF B ) ` F ) = ( seqom ( ( k e. dom G , z e. On |-> ( ( ( A ^o ( G ` k ) ) .o ( F ` ( G ` k ) ) ) +o z ) ) , (/) ) ` dom G ) ) $.
$d A k z $.
$d B k z $.
$d F k z $.
$d G k z $.
$d S k z $.
$d k ph z $.
$d k z $.
$d k z $.
$d k z $.
$d k z $.
$d k z $.
